content.prompt: The 1979 incident at Three Mile Island had which of the following effects?

choices.label: It intensified criticism of the Supreme Court.
It forced the United States to reconsider the policy of “massive retaliation.”
It increased public pressure to free the United States from dependence on foreign energy sources.
It increased support for the movement against nuclear power.

topic.text: 8.13: The Environment and Natural Resources from 1968 to 1980

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
